text:
@senatemajldr 1.75 Billion for an FBI building in this bill? Really? The Coronavirus bill should not have anything to do with a FBI building that’s supposed to be moved. Trump prevented it from getting moved so a competing hotel doesn’t show across from his. Ridiculous!
https://t.co/MB1k45p9zR
